alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 2:16AM EDT until April 10 at 5:20PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Richland, Calhoun and Lexington Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina... Stevens Creek Near Modoc affecting Edgefield and McCormick Counties. Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Calhoun and Richland Counties. North Fork Edisto River At Orangeburg affecting Orangeburg County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Congaree River At Carolina Eastman. * WHEN...Until Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 115.0 feet, Flooding occurs in low lying areas of the Carolina Eastman Facility and at the Congaree National Park. At 119.0 feet, Extensive flooding occurs in the Congaree National Park. Some area farmland is flooded. Minor flooding occurs at the Carolina Eastman Facility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 113.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 120.1 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 115.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and take action if necessary. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 215 PM EDT.
